result.execSummary:
The defendant Kenneth D. Szaflarski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: Concurrent to any sentence presently being served.

superMiscConds.notes: *AMENDED* DNA surcharges may be paid on ES.

No contact with victim and S.T. 
Absolute sobriety.

DNA sample and surcharge.
Not eligible for programming.
No restitution.
Register as a sex offender. 

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been faxed to the probation office.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: Concurrent to any sentence presently being served.

Count 2>>DRI
14CF138>>Amend Count 1 to delete the repeater enhancer
Count 2>>DRI
Court grants.
PLEA: 14CF137>>Amended Count 1>>2nd Degree Sexual Assault of a Child>>No Contest
14CF138>>Amended Count 1>>Forgery-Uttering/PTAC>>No Contest.
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: 14CF137>>Count 1>>9 years Prison broke down as 4 years IC and 5 years ES, concurrent to any sentence presently being served.
14CF138>>Count 1>>6 years Prison broke down as 3 years IC and 3 years ES, concurrent to any other sentence and 14CF137.
Condition of Supervision: DNA sample and surcharge, No contact with victim and ST, Absolute sobriety, Not eligible for programming. No restitution, Register as a sex offender. 29 days credit on each sentence.
